summary: These documents relate to the operational status and biographical data of Thomas E. Davis, including security checks, employment history, neighborhood investigation, and requests for operational clearance. The documents indicate interest in Davis for mapping work and operational use, with checks conducted by various agencies, including the FBI. Also included are biographical notes of James S. Ovens, the Director, Ohio State University Research Foundation, for operational clearance.
title: Thomas E. Davis Security and Operational Status
recipient: Chief, CI/Operational Approval and Support Division
sender: Chief, CI/Operational Approval and Support Division
